SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.deck

Class RevisionFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.deck.RevisionFXMLController
@Component public class RevisionFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller class for managing the card revision view in the application.

This view enables users to initiate regular or reverse revisions of a deck, and allows setting the daily number of new cards to review. The interface displays statistics on new and old cards available for revision in each mode.

    • initWithParams

      public void initWithParams(Object... params)
      Initializes the view with the provided deck parameter. Configures menu components, sets up button actions, and binds the new cards per day listener.
      Overrides:
      initWithParams in class FXMLController
      Parameters:
      params - Array of parameters, where the first element is expected to be a `DeckBase` instance.

    • updateSize

      public void updateSize()
      Updates the size of the view components based on the window size and scale factor. Adjusts font sizes and component dimensions dynamically.
      Overrides:
      updateSize in class FXMLController

    • updateTranslation

      public void updateTranslation()
      Updates the text labels and button texts based on the current language settings. Also updates card revision statistics displayed in the view.
      Overrides:
      updateTranslation in class FXMLController

    • updateNewCardsPerDay

      private void updateNewCardsPerDay()
      Updates the number of new cards per day for the current deck. Saves the new value to the deck's statistics.

      Initializes the icons used in the controller's UI components.
